metadata.synopsis: This is a guard that patrols the dock in Haven. Mood is generally stalwart. Their dialogue changes depending on Haven's state.

0.speaker: Harper Hangfar
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

1.speaker: Harper Hangfar
1.text: You were the one who took down Marcus, yeah? Nasty work.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

2.speaker: Harper Hangfar
2.text: You look well-equipped. Good. You wouldn't believe the state of some of these lads.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

3.speaker: Harper Hangfar
3.text: I played cards with Marcus. I thought we were friends.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.
